page.title: 20LEISURE - CLUBS & SOCIETIES
page.content:
Shareshill Women's Institute meet on the third Thursday of each month in the school hall. The senior citizens meet every Monday afternoon in Shareshill village hall. Youth clubs meet weekly in Calf Heath and Shareshill village halls. Badminton enthusiasts can play in Calf Heath village hall on Wednesdays. A children's dance class is held at the school on Saturdays and a karate class on Friday evenings. Shareshill village hall is the meeting place of the pre-school playgroup and the scouts.
This Domesday report has been compiled by Mrs.S.Reader,Mrs.B.Williams and Mrs.R.K.Williams,all of whom are members of Shareshill W.I.
